Gotron looks around the Alliance base. He bids it farewell and starts off, =
walking off towards nowhere in particular.
~~~~~
ThunderCracker: Do you thi=
nk we should offer the Chivtrons a chance to go with us?...

  ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
  From: Alloran2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
 =
 Sent: Tuesday, May 08, 2001 9:18 PM
  Subject: Re: Farewell to the Keepers=
!


  :::Gigatron/The Skyscorchers/Vulois::: 

  ::Vulois smiles:: 
  Vuloi=
s: Good. We shall depart as soon as possible. Have you a ship? 
  Windrazor=
: I bet the ship me and the other Skyscorchers came on is 
  salvageable. 
=
  Vulois: Great. Let's get it. 
  ::Awhile later, the ship is complete and =
has been flown to their location:: 
  Windrazor: Afterburner, is everything=
 working? 
  Afterburner: She's running as good as new. 
  Terradive: Aweso=
me! Let's get out of here! 
  Vulois: I have an idea, let's not go back to =
Cybertron. 
  Terradive: Why? 
  Gigatron: I know.  Because we will be surr=
ounded by bots that could start a 
  war at any minute. 
  Vulois: Exactly.=
 
  Windrazor: but where will we go? 
  Vulois: A little planet called Draz=
iw. 4th planet of the Andromeda galaxy.   
  There are no Transformers ther=
e except for a kind king and queen. 
  Afterburner: Sounds good, lets go. 
=
  ::They board the ship, but keep the door open so Thundercracker can get i=
n:: 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
       
       

  Your use of Yahoo! G=
roups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
